body.p: Simal Core is the main module for the Simal applications. It contains the RDF repository and a command line for interacting with that repository.
Simal core comes complete with a command line interface. to run it use simal.bat --help or simal.sh --help.
body.warning: Simal Core is currently in alpha. It is subject to change in response to discussions on the Simal developer list. Please join us and help us make Simal what it should be.
body.note: Our documentation is quite sparse at present. Please ask for help on our mailing list and we'll be sure to expand the documentation in response to your questions. Unless you ask, we don;t know what people need to see.
